status.name: ready
status.description: Records marked as 'Ready' are considered suitable for production use.

status.name: in_development
status.description: This status is used when a resource is in development. These resources can be used, but be aware that their specifications may change in future.

status.name: deprecated
status.description: Deprecated records are no longer considered suitable for use but information on them is retained for historical reference.

status.name: uncertain
status.description: The FAIRsharing curators don't have sufficient information to categorise this record; use these resources with caution. Please contact us, if you know more about the status of an 'uncertain' resource.
